page.title: 18Travelling to Work
page.content:
An Analysis of 52 Elwick pupils to see where pupils' parents work. This represents 39 families from Elwick and Dalton.73 Parents were analysed. No fathers were unemployed, but 19 mothers were housewives. { { _____________________________ {WORKING PLACE NUMBER
{Elwick - 12 Parents {Dalton - 1 Parent {Hartlepool - 17 Parents {Teesside - 4 " {Sunderand & Newcastle - 5 " {Abroad - 2 " {Any Other Places - 13 " {Home - 19 Mothers { _____________________________} Another survey we did resulted in us finding that approximately 20,000 cars pass within a quarter of a mile of Elwick, along the A19, each day.
